Patrick Reignier (UJF/Gravir)

Method Detail

create

Service create(java.lang.String serviceName)
Registers a new Omiscid service. This service is not yet advertised in DSN-SD. It must be first launched (see Service.start()).
Caution : As long as the service is not started, it is still possible to add connectors or variables . Adding connectors or variables to a started service will trigger an exception.

Parameters:
serviceName - the name of the service as it will appear in DNS-SD
Returns:
the bip service. All access to the service will be through this object
See Also:
Service.addConnector(String, String, ConnectorType), Service.addVariable(String, String, String, fr.prima.omiscid.user.variable.VariableAccessType)

create

Service create(java.lang.String serviceName,
               java.lang.String className)
Registers a new Omiscid service. This service is not yet advertised in DSN-SD. It must be first launched (see Service.start()).
Caution : As long as the service is not started, it is still possible to add connectors or variables . Adding connectors or variables to a started service will trigger an exception.

Parameters:
serviceName - the name of the service as it will appear in DNS-SD
className - the name of the service class
Returns:
the bip service. All access to the service will be through this object
See Also:
Service.addConnector(String, String, ConnectorType), Service.addVariable(String, String, String, fr.prima.omiscid.user.variable.VariableAccessType)

createFromXML

Service createFromXML(java.io.InputStream stream)
                      throws InvalidDescriptionException
Creates a new Bip service. This service is not yet advertised in DSN-SD. It must first be launched (see Service.start())
Caution : As long as the service is not started, it is still possible to add connectors or variables. Adding connectors or variables to a started service will trigger an exception.

Parameters:
stream - the input stream of the xml service description
Returns:
the bip service. All access to the service will be through this object
Throws:
InvalidDescriptionException - the xml file does not respect the corresponding schema
See Also:
Service.addConnector(String, String, ConnectorType), Service.addVariable(String, String, String, fr.prima.omiscid.user.variable.VariableAccessType)
